meanings.definition: To describe or explain in detail.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours detailing every step of the process in her report.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is detailing the instructions for the science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The detective was detailing the crime scene with precision and focus.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was so vivid, it felt like she was detailing a painting with words.
meanings.sent5: He was detailing the map with colorful markers to make it easier to follow.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or decorating meticulously.
meanings.sent1: The car detailing service made his vehicle shine like new.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys doing detailing on furniture to make it look elegant.
meanings.sent3: The detailing of the cupcakes with tiny edible flowers was a delightful touch.
meanings.sent4: The intricate detailing on the wedding dress added a touch of glamour.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous detailing of the garden made it a peaceful retreat.

meanings.definition: The small elements or features that make up a larger whole.
meanings.sent1: The detailing on the dress showcased the designer's attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: Each tiny detailing on the model ship was crafted with care.
meanings.sent3: The intricate detailing on the necklace caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The architectural detailing on the building gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The delicate detailing on the china set it apart from the rest.
